div.bibl: Courier, December 26, 1911. Meeting of Maimonides Kosher Hospital Tonight

body.p: A meeting is called this evening at 8 PM by the Advisory Board of the Maimonides Kosher Hospital, at the Palace Opera building, 1145 Blue Island Avenue.
250 representatives of over 100 different Lodges, Societies and Synagogues are expected at this meeting.
The Board will make reports of all resolutions adopted by the different organizations.
